channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.22 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.22

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix RTA for content of DynamicPageTitle
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Keyboard navigation after focusItem() now continues from the focused item
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridList: Navigation matrix elements are included if they have DOM element
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Count in filter is now visible on mobile Safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: apply horizon theme updates
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: OPA tests in demo app are now running
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: f7 qunit is now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarAppointment: getDomRef() now returns proper DOM element
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now allow the customization of controls using UI adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: In the analytical list page, we now allow customizing SmartFilterBar using UI adaptation
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolPage: Parent busy indicator is now shown on ToolPage
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterPanel: Filtering is now working for fields binded via association entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: In case of deep create the model create entry only expects path and properties with oData
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Component: skip the sync processing of i18n before resources are loaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: Stabilize QUnit test for BeaconRequest
  • Library: sap.ui.dt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.rta - minimenu icons overlap - correction
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: ConditionType: leave empty unit as it is, only update only undefined
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarAppointment: getDomRef() now returns proper DOM element
  • Library: sap.ui.webc.fiori
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.webc.fiori: Third party zxing configuration corrected
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Downport of changes

item.title: Version 1.108.27 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.27

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Scrollbar issue fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Focus of IconTabFilter is not changing
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Focus element is scrolled into view
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Search is complete announcement now has correct result count
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Fixed currency code with TextArrangement
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Prevent NaN timestamp for Date/Time columns

item.title: Version 1.108.21 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.21

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the handling of 412 errors when the action is triggered using the chevron
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: adjust to horizon theme updates
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Uses correct active text parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DynamicDateRange: validation errors from value help are not propagated outside
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Fire intervalSelect event date from another month
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: DateNavigation now uses firstDayOfWeek
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: Value is now formatted even if matching with previous value
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: removed max-width of the menu
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectStatus: apply horizon theme updates
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the registration as a dirty state provider can be avoided when the application is read only
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: Extra space below FilterBar filters is now removed
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Prepare for upcoming 'unload' event deprecation and deprecate APIs 'onWindowBeforeUnload', 'onWindowUnload' and 'onWindowError' in 'sap/ui/core/Component'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#resetChanges: do not remove persistent messages
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Menu: removed max-width of the menu
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Reset selectedSection corrected
  • Library: sap.viz
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap viz: skip unstable test

item.title: Version 1.108.23 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.23

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Item selection and highlighting with dynamic suggestions now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.List/Table: Accessibility improvements
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: preserve H1, H2, H3, H4, H5 and H6 tags default 'display' CSS property
  • Library: sap.ndc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ndc: Add one parameter to enable/disable Barcode Input Dialog
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We are now setting the correct variant while saving a tile
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that registering a filter provider at the message button helper works fine even if outdated binding path info is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: Record selection on the UI table is now cleared after executing the function import action
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: Padding when there is no menu button fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnsController: Duplicated indexes of the Columns fix
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: reset now works as expected
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/routing: find parent route from the router of the inheritance parent
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.test.autowaiter._timeoutWaiter: Callback arguments corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.Toolbar: Fix failing qUnit tests in Firefox

item.title: Version 1.108.24 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.24

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Arrow has hover state now
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: For the list report, semantic date is now shown when default values are maintained
    • Type: FIX, Description: While checking for an equivalent key, sibling entity is not considered now during draft creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added custom data to use FLP timezone for smart table in the analytical list page and list report object page
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: Context menu now successfully opens on items with 'href' set
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Label is now properly updated and displayed on UoM scenario
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Empty operator for Edm.Guid type now sends default guid instead of empty string
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: Tooltip is correctly set for numeric fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: VariantConverterTo: Exclude sign is now correct for multiple ranges
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: applyVariant now respects given order of items as argument
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Single filter field doesn't select row if there are multiple rows with same key
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.lib._CollectionCache#read: avoid endless busy indicator sometimes when scrolling up
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust week days announcement

item.title: Version 1.108.25 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.25

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: fix error on opening Popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Fix hiding of popover due to re-rendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DraftIndicator: JSDoc corrected
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue that persisted while refreshing the table after executing the function import action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now improved our logic to set the focus on the first editable field on the object page when switch to edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: Clean up actions are now performed correctly when the transient message dialog is closed in all the scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: An error message dialog is now displayed instead of navigating to the 'Object Not Found' page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the back navigation in fixed column layout when a draft is cancelled in between
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: remove focus catcher
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: property enabled handling corrected
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: fire data received event if request is aborted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#submitChangesWithHeaders: ensure change requests use custom headers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#_getPropertyMetadata: fix for complex type property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataTreeBinding: Fix grouping of Application filters in OperationMode.Server
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: handle properties of type Edm.time in grouping

item.title: Version 1.108.26 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.26

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've introduced the isTrustedSource property as a security enhancement for the PDFViewer control as detailed in the API reference
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiInput: Escape text value when creating tokens with validator
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Initialise event is now fired after metadata initialization

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: apply horizon theme updates
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: Padding when there is no menu button fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: reset now works as expected
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct single text arrangement when multiple calls to setFilterData are performed
    • Type: FIX, Description: In case of deep create the model create entry only expects path and properties with oData
  • Library: sap.ui.core

    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Shortcut: trigger "blur" within a timeout

item.title: Version 1.114.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.114.9

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: The Form building block can now have a metaPath that uses 1:1 navigation pointing to a FieldGroup annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added the prefix 'cmd:' to the commands defined in the manifest for actions
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the opensOnFocus value of the MDC field is set based on the focusInfo parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added the prefix 'cmd:' to the commands defined in the manifest for actions
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Fix navigation skipping
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FeedListItem: fixed icon appearance
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnsController: Duplicated indexes of the Columns fix
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Title of the table is correctly set when there is already a table extension
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataListBinding#loadData: read all data (up to model size limit) in "Client" mode

item.title: Version 1.114.14 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.114.14

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Item selection and highlighting with dynamic suggestions now fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: preserve H1, H2, H3, H4, H5 and H6 tags default 'display' CSS property
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Single filter field doesn't select row if there are multiple rows with same key

    • Type: FIX, Description: core/routing: find parent route from the router of the inheritance parent

  • Library: sap.ui.comp

item.description:
Changes in Version 1.117.2

  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the opensOnFocus value is set based on the focusInfo parameter
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Value state box-shadow adjusted

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: show correct time with bound timezone
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataListBinding#loadData: read all data (up to model size limit) in "Client" mode

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataListBinding#_getSkipAndTop: fix calculation of "iLimit"
    • Type: FIX, Description: Fix Core Qunit tests

item.title: Version 1.117.5 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.117.5

  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: Revert SmartFilterBar: correct single text arrangement when multiple calls to setFilterData are performed"
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.Toolbar: Fix failing qUnit tests in Firefox

item.title: Version 1.120.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.1

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: fix not visible column
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Restrict column size
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now recalculate the default values in empty row mode if the table is refreshed using a side effect
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the preferredMode=edit parameter that launches an object page directly in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure you can empty an email field after you’ve entered a valid email address
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the SideEffects annotation can request messages on a subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the EditState that led to an additional refresh of the list report
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with using the OData V2 model on the overview page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the enabled property of the delete button in a table is updated, after an action was carried out
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved the button style issue in the footer of the Accept Recommendations confirmation dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that selecting the begin button in an action parameter dialog only triggers the action once
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the relevant custom filters are also correctly applied to other entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the SideEffects annotation also on the overview page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the getKey() function is used to access the key value of oVariant, as the object structure has changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: The FPM Explorer now works properly even during long sessions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the byID provided by our ExtensionAPI returns custom controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure text annotation is considered for semantic keys inside a grid table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing progress data points are correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the TypeDefinition is managed as a typed property when the entity is declared directly in a CAP service
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use a separate ListBinding for the singleDraftForCreate setting
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application can load even with an unexpected format set on the TargetProperties of a SideEffects annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly manage the SelectionVariant annotation configured with the RangeSignType ‘Exclude’ for multiple views
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that prevented updating a field with the static unit of measure ‘%’
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure you can close a column in an app using the flexible column layout after an intent-based navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: When exporting a table to spreadsheet, the "Target Value" column is no longer included for DataPoints without a target value
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the handling of 412 errors when the action is triggered using the chevron
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now recalculate the default values in empty row mode if the table is refreshed using a side effect
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a multi-valued field in a list report that uses the flexible column layout is not editable when the object page is in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check for the maximum allowed length of an email address when entering it in an input field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the relevant custom filters are also correctly applied to other entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added the prefix 'cmd:' to the commands defined in the manifest for actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the byID provided by our ExtensionAPI returns custom controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure text annotation is considered for semantic keys inside a grid table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing progress data points are correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the width of a text area in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly manage the SelectionVariant annotation configured with the RangeSignType ‘Exclude’ for multiple views
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that prevented updating a field with the static unit of measure ‘%’
    • Type: FIX, Description: Drag and drop is now disabled when dragging an item from a tree table and dropping it outside the tree table
    • Type: FIX, Description: When exporting a table to spreadsheet, the "Target Value" column is no longer included for DataPoints without a target value
    • Type: FIX, Description: The messageButton link is now disabled if the associated message is not targeting a property
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved several issues when adding items using a MultiValueField
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the filter values of value help used on a multi-valued field are retrieved correctly
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now recalculate the default values in empty row mode if the table is refreshed using a side effect
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the preferredMode=edit parameter that launches an object page directly in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the relevant custom filters are also correctly applied to other entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the opensOnFocus value of the MDC field is set based on the focusInfo parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added the prefix 'cmd:' to the commands defined in the manifest for actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now set the focus on the first editable field upon the initial load of the object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved several issues when adding items using a MultiValueField
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the opensOnFocus value is set based on the focusInfo parameter
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateRangeSelection: using a stable date in a test scenario
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: In the analytical list page, we now allow customizing SmartFilterBar using UI adaptation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now corrected the importance property of table columns with the ratings and progress indicators
    • Type: FIX, Description: For the analytical list page, we've now added a check for the undefined SmartFilterBar
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now adapted the usage of 'navigationFinished', the new navigation event
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now introduced manifest settings for the Copy button in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the creation of integration cards that are supported for multiple scenarios view for the list report applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the placeholder is hidden while starting the RTA mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: For the object page, we now ensure that the focus is back on the control when a validation is triggered
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the the correct variant is set while saving a title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that registering a filter provider at the message button helper works fine even if outdated binding path info is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: List report applications can now send the insight cards to the insight card channel
    • Type: FIX, Description: Record selection on the UI table is now cleared after executing the function import action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue that occurred while sharing the insights card to the collaboration manager
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the filter creation to support boolean type in MultipleViewsHandler
    • Type: FIX, Description: Status indicator column is now supported in integration cards
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that changes on item level are reflected in the item page immediately after activating a draft
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have now enhanced the test library functions to correctly find the MultiSelectionPlugin for UI tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue that occurred while sharing the insights card to the collaboration manager
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Lazy loading of annotations in SmartTable
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: prevent invalid values from AdaptFilters dialog
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Deprecation of sap/ui/core/search classes
    • Type: FIX, Description: Interaction: Fix start time determination
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/base/Formatting.(get|set)LegacyDateCalendarCustomizing to sap/ui/base/Formatting.(get|set)CustomIslamicCalendarData
    • Type: FIX, Description: onlocalizationEvent not fired
    • Type: FIX, Description: ManagedObjectMetadata: Introduce missing 'defaultClass' setting for aggregations
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Component: skip the sync processing of i18n before resources are loaded
  • Library: sap.ui.documentation
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.documentation: replace UI5 URLs correctly when samples are downloaded
  • Library: sap.ui.dt
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
  • Library: sap.ui.fl
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: not possible to enter multiple lines
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: Autocomplete shows wrong value if backend slow
  • Library: sap.ui.rta
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/core/Component#get to sap/ui/core/Component#getComponentById
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: onlocalizationEvent not fired
  • Library: sap.ui.ux3
    • Type: FIX, Description: Interaction: Fix start time determination
  • Library: sap.ui.webc.common
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename sap/ui/base/Formatting.(get|set)LegacyDateCalendarCustomizing to sap/ui/base/Formatting.(get|set)CustomIslamicCalendarData
  • Library: sap.viz
    • Type: FIX, Description: FlattenedDataset: define defaultClass for "dimensions" and "measure" aggregation

item.title: Version 1.120.2 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.2

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Fix failing OPA tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Shortcut: trigger "blur" within a timeout
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: The Form building block can now have a metaPath that uses 1:1 navigation pointing to a FieldGroup annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated a function in the AppStartupHelper file to handle null annotations when using the preferredMode=edit parameter
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: The Form building block can now have a metaPath that uses 1:1 navigation pointing to a FieldGroup annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure a MultiValue Field that’s used in a read-only Table building block isn’t editable
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Tabular suggestions are now always highlighted
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Reopen Suggestion Popover when new data is bound
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.SelectionController: fix for index of the move determination
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FormattedText: preserve H1, H2, H3, H4, H5 and H6 tags default 'display' CSS property
    • Type: FIX, Description: Deprecate InputODataSuggestProvider in sap/m/library.js
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: add check if date is parsed correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.FacetFilter: adjust select all checkbox
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.Table: Enter should fire selectionChange in SingleSelectMaster
  • Library: sap.ndc
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ndc: Add one parameter to enable/disable Barcode Input Dialog
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: For the list report, semantic date is now shown when default values are maintained
  • Library: sap.tnt
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.NavigationListItem: Context menu now successfully opens on items with 'href' set
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.tnt.ToolHeader: Padding when there is no menu button fixed
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Single filter field doesn't select row if there are multiple rows with same key
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControlProvider: ValueList metadata is fetched only if needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SVM: always reset the author after a new view was saved
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: table selectionBehavior is now RowSelector for multi selection fields
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Add 'FUTURE FATAL' Marker for error/warning logs
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v4.lib._CollectionCache#read: avoid endless busy indicator sometimes when scrolling up
    • Type: FIX, Description: CLDR: allow user input based on historical variants for month abbreviations
    • Type: FIX, Description: core.Lib: Add debug log statement when registering enums
    • Type: FIX, Description: Introduce sap/ui/core/ElementRegistry/ComponentRegistry/UIAreaRegistry
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/qunit: Deprecate ControlRenderer test
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/routing: find parent route from the router of the inheritance parent
    • Type: FIX, Description: XMLTemplateProcessor: Reintroduce FUTURE-FATAL log for missing control classes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.FilterProcessor.combineFilters: combine Filter.NONE with other filters
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/XMLTemplateProcessor: load class of nested view before instance creation
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataMessageParser#_createTarget: normalize also the full target
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.odata4analytics.FilterExpression#renderUI5FilterArray: fix sorting of filters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.message.Message fix references to MessageType
    • Type: FIX, Description: Deprecate sap.ui.core.Message/MessageType
    • Type: FIX, Description: Deprecate public registry of Component, Element and UIArea
    • Type: FIX, Description: Views: Cloning a View is deprecated in favor of the specific factory functions
    • Type: FIX, Description: Ensure correct 'resource-root' and 'theme-root' configuration
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.test.action.EnterText: Revert restriction
    • Type: FIX, Description: Lib/ui5loader: Provide deprecation message for pseudo-modules
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Shortcut: trigger "blur" within a timeout
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: mTable: consider useFirstMatch on filtering existing items
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelp: first item shown as selected too when other item is selected
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: Currency/unit value do not overwrite initial parts with null
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: Column: Sort order if "sorted" and "sortOrder" are bound
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust week days announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.FileUploader: prevent unexpected error

item.title: Version 1.120.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.4

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Fixed incorrect rendering of separator
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the OData request for the Delete action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the navigation while the shell isn't available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented some fields from being editable in an app using the flexible column layout and a sticky edit session.
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented some fields from being editable in an app using the flexible column layout and a sticky edit session.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer display ‘undefined’ under a collection facet when no label is defined
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: load items with data binding on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimeField: Doesn't throw error when the binding type is string.
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: fix for save in 'Manage Dialog'
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: apply horizon theme updates
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: Arrow has hover state now
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: Legends on the smart charts are now displayed properly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue that persisted while refreshing the table after executing the function import action
    • Type: FIX, Description: Text arrangements are now supported in insights cards for analytical list page applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: Row navigation is now disabled from the insights card for the multiple view list report applications
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the dependency between availability of copy button and availability of cell selection feature in the object page tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue that came up while retaining the custom variant during external navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue with finding the first editable cell in the UI tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've fixed the batch call issue in non-draft for required properties and a batch call is not triggered now if a required or mandatory field is not filled
    • Type: FIX, Description: Clean up actions are now performed correctly when the transient message dialog is closed in all the scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: An error message dialog is now displayed instead of navigating to the 'Object Not Found' page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterPanel: Filtering is now working for fields binded via association entity
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Label is now properly updated and displayed on UoM scenario
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.SmartVariantManagement: property enabled handling corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Change event correctly propagates the new value.
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: ComboBox busy indicator
    • Type: FIX, Description: LegacyFreeUI5 - Check failing tests
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/ODataMetadata#_getPropertyMetadata: fix for complex type property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.core.cldr.zh_TW.json: Replace "B" to "a" in default timeFormats
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/_ODataMetaModelUtils#merge: liftSAPData is called with correct parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.analytics.AnalyticalBinding: handle properties of type Edm.time in grouping

item.title: Version 1.120.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.3

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that was preventing the Apply button on the subobject page to navigate back to the object page once clicked
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that both the active object and its draft are deleted by using model.delete
    • Type: FIX, Description: Filterable properties listed in table personalization are now synchronized with the filterable properties in the filter bar
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now use the odata.concat function for labels in reference facets
    • Type: FIX, Description: Filterable properties listed in table personalization are now synchronized with the filterable properties in the filter bar
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Restored arrow navigation
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: The sibling entity is not considered now during draft creation while checking for an equivalent key
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Empty operator for Edm.Guid type now sends default guid instead of empty string
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterProvider: Tooltip is correctly set for numeric fields
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterPanel: Filter for fiscal year period now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: TextArrangement nullable with clientSideMandatoryCheck false
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataTreeBinding: consider deep path for context
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.base.i18n.date.TimezoneUtils.calculateOffset: Fix Daylight Saving Time issues
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: mdc.FilterBar: ensure the correct event sequence
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: Prevent layout flickering

item.title: Version 1.120.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.6

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with applying a transient iAppState
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now execute the PrepareAction property by pressing Enter on object page tables in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue for applications using the flexible column layout, which was causing the Save or Cancel action to fail after refreshing the page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle 412 errors for critical actions
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with displaying the text annotation in the quick view title
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with displaying the text annotation in the quick view title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with exporting columns added using page variant management in a list report with multiple views
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Apply additional padding on FF
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nConditionPanel: Fields of Between operation are now in correct order
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: The application state is now restored for multiple table view
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.v2.ODataModel#submitChangesWithHeaders: ensure change requests use custom headers
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: P13nBuilder: Add button is now visible
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adding padding when two calendars are next to each other
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix collapsing header

item.title: Version 1.120.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.7

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: Title binding now works properly if the value is a path with conditions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the corrupt context of a previously visited object page resulted in an error message while subsequently loading the same object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: The DateTime data type now supports the UTC format
    • Type: FIX, Description: When repeating action triggers for multiple rows that have received a 412 warning on action execution, we no longer trigger the action for rows that have executed their action successfully
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnMenu: Provide a proper overflow handling
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct single text arrangement when multiple calls to setFilterData are performed
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Initialise event is now fired after metadata initialization
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.odata.ODataMetaModel#getODataValueLists: fetch missing metadata

item.title: Version 1.120.8 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.8

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: If the manifest configuration for an object page uses a contextPath parameter instead of entitySet, we ensure that a confirmation dialog is displayed while navigating away from the object page in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the custom message as a message strip on the object page header upon initial navigation using the onAfterBinding controller extension
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: If the manifest configuration for an object page uses a contextPath parameter instead of entitySet, we ensure that a confirmation dialog is displayed while navigating away from the object page in edit mode
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Missing label in ColumnMenu
  • Library: sap.ui.integration
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: Remove scrollbar from snack layer when not needed

item.title: Version 1.120.12 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.12

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions are correctly visualized
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: Resolve issue preventing text selection with mouse

  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: adjust header buttons width

item.title: Version 1.121.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.0

  • Library: sap.chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: Rename onlocalizationChanged to onlocalizationChanged
  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: : Integration Cards: Image with text overlay can be used in the Object Card
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.ShellBar: Search and copilot reworked
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Enable CSRF tokens usage through new binding syntax
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: nested HTML elements are now correct
    • Type: FIX, Description: Integration Cards: DateTimestamp text in the header is translated now
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Rounding issue corected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: LayoutType documentation improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Documentation improved
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Fixed incorrect rendering of separator
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: samples updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Fix failing OPA tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Shortcut: trigger "blur" within a timeout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: fix not visible column
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Reveal/conceal mechanism fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.SidePanel: actionBarExpanded now works when there is only one action item
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Restrict column size
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Fix RTA for content of DynamicPageTitle
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.integration.widgets.Card: aria-level is correct when card is in dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageHeader: Aligned with visual specification
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now hide the label of the text area if it is the only field in a section or subsection on an object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: In the header facet, we now consider the UI.Hidden annotation set on a DataPoint
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an option in the context menu to open an item in a new tab or window
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now enable app developers to hide the options Share: Microsoft Teams and Send E-Mail from the Share menu
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide getCurrentVariantKey and setCurrentVariantKey as public APIs for the Chart API
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Avoid rendering an empty QuickView when no details are available
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the annotation SelectionPresentationVariant on a building block Table and an object page facet
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a total for every analytical table column with an aggregated property by default
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've reduced the number of batch requests when starting an application with parameters or x-app state
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now exclude navigation properties from external navigation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support parameterized entity sets for charts
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The section or subsection title is now merged with the table or chart title if the section or subsection only has one table or chart control
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support multi-value filtering with custom operators in the FilterBar
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide getPresentationVariant and setPresentationVariant as public APIs for the Chart building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the annotation @Common.IsNaturalPerson for the avatar
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide getPresentationVariant and setPresentationVariant as public APIs for the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now allow enhancing the request of the Table building block before rebinding it
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support optimistic batch requests for list reports in auto-load scenarios in SAP Fiori elements for OData V4
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now implemented a manifest setting openInEditMode, that allows to open an object page directly in edit mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a generic context menu for tables in the list report and the object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define the 'plugins' attribute for the RichTextEditor building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Value help fields with the type-ahead dropdown list can now display recently entered values
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define and hide the table header using the manifest.json
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the analytical tables, grid tables, responsive tables, and tree tables on mobile devices
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use metadata binding for custom filters and custom form elements
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide APIs that can programmatically show and hide filter fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the preferredMode=edit parameter that launches an object page directly in edit mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now recalculate the default values in empty row mode if the table is refreshed using a side effect
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that the list report properties for multiple views annotated using UI.SelectionFields are available among other filter bar properties
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a getEnabled and setEnabled method for the field
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define tooltips for custom columns in the manifest.json and for slot columns using the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide support for telemetry capabilities
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a setValue method for the field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved and issue with using unit of measure fields in the collaborative draft
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that both the active object and its draft are deleted by using model.delete
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that copying a row in a table with the draft indicator in a separate columns works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: Filterable properties listed in table personalization are now synchronized with the filterable properties in the filter bar
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with a property referencing non-existing properties in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure users cannot proceed if required fields with currency code or unit does not have any value
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with circular dependencies failing in action and column positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly position the Cancel action at the end of the edit dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: A warning is now displayed when a user executes an action with selected items that are not applicable to the specific action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that connected fields correctly displays the asterisk sign for mandatory fields, and that the valuehelp is properly loaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated a function in the AppStartupHelper file to handle null annotations when using the preferredMode=edit parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with a duplicate Edit button appearing in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: The Form building block can now have a metaPath that uses 1:1 navigation pointing to a FieldGroup annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now only check the relative navigation properties when enabling table filtering
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer display information about any active filters in the filter bar of the list report in case the filter bar is hidden
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure you can empty an email field after you’ve entered a valid email address
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the SideEffects annotation can request messages on a subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with applying the flexible column layout when using the navigateToRoute controller extension
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support filter restrictions on navigation properties
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that caused the Create dialog to flicker when the language was set to 'Technical code 1' (1Q)
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with using the OData V2 model on the overview page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the enabled property of the delete button in a table is updated, after an action was carried out
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved the button style issue in the footer of the Accept Recommendations confirmation dialog
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the navigation when the shell isn't available
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support the SideEffects annotation also on the overview page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the relevant custom filters are also correctly applied to other entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the EditState that led to an additional refresh of the list report
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the SelectionMode is applied correctly in a list report that has custom actions only
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly use the HashChanger API to get the app-specific hash
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the getKey() function is used to access the key value of oVariant, as the object structure has changed
    • Type: FIX, Description: Custom menu actions in the table toolbar are now placed before standard actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the byID provided by our ExtensionAPI returns custom controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the required field indicator when calculating the column width
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve improved the error handling in the action parameter dialog following the introduction of the double click prevention
    • Type: FIX, Description: When exporting a table as split cells, we now ensure that columns with the FieldGroup annotation and custom columns retain the original data type for single cells
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure text annotation is considered for semantic keys inside a grid table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the TypeDefinition is managed as a typed property when the entity is declared directly in a CAP service
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the type of the value when parsing the default values of action parameters
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now delay the forward navigation from the object page to correctly execute it after saving the draft
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that selecting the begin button in an action parameter dialog only triggers the action once
    • Type: FIX, Description: REVERT We now ensure that the entity is returned by an action"
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the application can load even with an unexpected format set on the TargetProperties of a SideEffects annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use a separate ListBinding for the singleDraftForCreate setting
    • Type: FIX, Description: When using the inline creation mode in a table, we now set the focus on the newly created row
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now change the order of the action buttons using the manifest
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that prevented updating a field with the static unit of measure ‘%’
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly manage the SelectionVariant annotation configured with the RangeSignType ‘Exclude’ for multiple views
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check that the OperationAvailable annotation exists and is set to true before enabling an action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing progress data points are correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with rendering custom form elements when using the Form building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the handling of 412 errors when the action is triggered using the chevron
    • Type: FIX, Description: When exporting a table to spreadsheet, the "Target Value" column is no longer included for DataPoints without a target value
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle 412 errors for critical actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure you can close a column in an app using the flexible column layout after an intent-based navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the entity is returned by an action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented some fields from being editable in an app using the flexible column layout and a sticky edit session.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing units are correctly exported
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now hide the label of the text area if it is the only field in a section or subsection on an object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We have now restructured the suggestion list shown for Value Help fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: App developers can now use SAP Fiori tools in adaptation projects to adapt tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: In the header facet, we now consider the UI.Hidden annotation set on a DataPoint
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an option in the context menu to open an item in a new tab or window
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now enable app developers to hide the options Share: Microsoft Teams and Send E-Mail from the Share menu
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide getCurrentVariantKey and setCurrentVariantKey as public APIs for the Chart API
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Avoid rendering an empty QuickView when no details are available
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the annotation SelectionPresentationVariant on a building block Table and an object page facet
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've reduced the number of batch requests when starting an application with parameters or x-app state
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now use blanks instead of dashes for empty stream properties in tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now exclude navigation properties from external navigation
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support parameterized entity sets for charts
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The section or subsection title is now merged with the table or chart title if the section or subsection only has one table or chart control
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide APIs that can programmatically enable and disable filter fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support multi-value filtering with custom operators in the FilterBar
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide getCurrentVariantKey and setCurrentVariantKey as public APIs for the FilterBarAPI
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The Table building block now supports the analytical table type
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support the annotation @Common.IsNaturalPerson for the avatar
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide getPresentationVariant and setPresentationVariant as public APIs for the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now allow enhancing the request of the Table building block before rebinding it
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support optimistic batch requests for list reports in auto-load scenarios in SAP Fiori elements for OData V4
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide stable IDs for the Field building block when used in standalone mode
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a generic context menu for tables in the list report and the object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define the 'plugins' attribute for the RichTextEditor building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Value help fields with the type-ahead dropdown list can now display recently entered values
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use metadata binding for custom filters and custom form elements
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide APIs that can programmatically show and hide filter fields
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now recalculate the default values in empty row mode if the table is refreshed using a side effect
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a getEnabled and setEnabled method for the field
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now define tooltips for custom columns in the manifest.json and for slot columns using the Table building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide support for telemetry capabilities
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide a setValue method for the field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the display of header facets in an object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now also show recently used values for fields that have a value
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer display ‘undefined’ under a collection facet when no label is defined
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer display a table context menu if it is empty
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved and issue with using unit of measure fields in the collaborative draft
    • Type: FIX, Description: Maven build for a table now loads the library instead of individual files
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly manage the UI.hidden annotation for the field group of the quick view popover
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now use the odata.concat function for labels in reference facets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that copying a row in a table with the draft indicator in a separate columns works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented the object identifier from being clickable
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the expandable text 'Show More' is clickable
    • Type: FIX, Description: Filterable properties listed in table personalization are now synchronized with the filterable properties in the filter bar
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that connected fields correctly displays the asterisk sign for mandatory fields, and that the valuehelp is properly loaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now show the recently used values for unit of measurement fields and take values from multiple conditions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the value help works also in a MultiValueField that has a ValueListParameterIn property
    • Type: FIX, Description: The Form building block can now have a metaPath that uses 1:1 navigation pointing to a FieldGroup annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now only check the relative navigation properties when enabling table filtering
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure a MultiValue Field that’s used in a read-only Table building block isn’t editable
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly trigger the SideEffects annotation when a new row is created using the inline creation mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support filter restrictions on navigation properties
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that a multi-valued field in a list report that uses the flexible column layout is not editable when the object page is in edit mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now check for the maximum allowed length of an email address when entering it in an input field
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now added the prefix 'cmd:' to the commands defined in the manifest for actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the relevant custom filters are also correctly applied to other entity sets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with calculating the column width for tables used in type-aheads and for tables used in value helps with fixed values
    • Type: FIX, Description: Links with stream properties are now enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the byID provided by our ExtensionAPI returns custom controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the required field indicator when calculating the column width
    • Type: FIX, Description: When exporting a table as split cells, we now ensure that columns with the FieldGroup annotation and custom columns retain the original data type for single cells
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure text annotation is considered for semantic keys inside a grid table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now delay the forward navigation from the object page to correctly execute it after saving the draft
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with displaying the Text annotation in the title of the contact quick view
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the draft indicator is displayed for columns annotated with DataFieldForIntentBasedNavigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now update the target value of a filter bar in the list report using the ValueHelp Out parameter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the quick view popover not displaying when the user clicks multiple times on various links
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the width of a text area in a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue that prevented updating a field with the static unit of measure ‘%’
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly manage the SelectionVariant annotation configured with the RangeSignType ‘Exclude’ for multiple views
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer retrieve the description with the getDescription method if the key is undefined
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with providing the source context in the isMoveToPositionAllowed extension point
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing progress data points are correctly exported
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure there is no extra padding added to a field from a field group when it is hidden using an annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the filter values of value help used on a multi-valued field are retrieved correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved several issues when adding items using a MultiValueField
    • Type: FIX, Description: Drag and drop is now disabled when dragging an item from a tree table and dropping it outside the tree table
    • Type: FIX, Description: When exporting a table to spreadsheet, the "Target Value" column is no longer included for DataPoints without a target value
    • Type: FIX, Description: SideEffects network requests on structural changes (create/delete) relying on MultiValueField are now ordered appropriately
    • Type: FIX, Description: The messageButton link is now disabled if the associated message is not targeting a property
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue that prevented some fields from being editable in an app using the flexible column layout and a sticky edit session.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the columns containing units are correctly exported

item.title: Version 1.121.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.121.1

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with applying a transient iAppState
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the text area label is hidden if it is the only field in a section or subsection
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the text area label is hidden if it is the only field in a section or subsection
  • Library: sap.m

item.title: Version 1.122.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.122.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Integration Cards: Adds option for hyphenation in header
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: sap.f.GridContainer: Enable support for UI5 Flexibility actions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Scrollbar issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.ProductSwitch: Acc sample improved
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Unbound actions can now also trigger side effects
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use additional properties to adapt list report tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer display the semantic link if the quick view isn't defined and an app isn't assigned to the user's role
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that properties referenced by a LineItem annotated with UI.Hidden are hidden as well
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support displaying fields with a fixed value list as radio buttons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: End users can now delete the empty rows of a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide getCurrentVariantKey and setCurrentVariantKey as public APIs for the TableAPI
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: For columns with a text arrangement annotation, we no longer display ‘Description’ as an option in the ‘Columns’ tab of the personalization dialog of the table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated our API documentation and the descriptions in the flexible programming model with the information that providing the ID is mandatory when creating a Field building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with the application breaking after discarding a draft
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where the corrupt context of a previously visited object page resulted in an error message while subsequently loading the same object page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct order of fields in the Create popup
    • Type: FIX, Description: When repeating action triggers for multiple rows that have received a 412 warning on action execution, we no longer trigger the action for rows that have executed their action successfully
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where filter fields containing the UI.AdaptationHidden property with a navigation path weren't applied to the filter request even though they were added in the UI.SelectionFields annotation.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that trigger actions are executed in separate changesets
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the default SemanticDate operator works as expected
    • Type: FIX, Description: The DateTime data type now supports the UTC format
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with applying a transient iAppState
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now execute the PrepareAction property by pressing Enter on object page tables in apps using the flexible column layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue for applications using the flexible column layout, which was causing the Save or Cancel action to fail after refreshing the page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with destroying a flexible column layout view when navigating back from it
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure filter fields from the manifest are not added to a custom filter bar pointing to a different entity set
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the OData request for the Delete action
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display the custom message as a message strip on the object page header upon initial navigation using the onAfterBinding controller extension
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that in page mode, the section title is hidden only for sections with a single control
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use additional properties to adapt list report tables
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer display the semantic link if the quick view isn't defined and an app isn't assigned to the user's role
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now ensure that properties referenced by a LineItem annotated with UI.Hidden are hidden as well
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support displaying fields with a fixed value list as radio buttons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: End users can now delete the empty rows of a table
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide getCurrentVariantKey and setCurrentVariantKey as public APIs for the TableAPI
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've updated our API documentation and the descriptions in the flexible programming model with the information that providing the ID is mandatory when creating a Field building block
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that aggregatable properties are no longer added to the sort options
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the quick view popover description is correctly displayed by using the TextArrangement annotation in the HeaderInfo.Description annotation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where filter fields containing the UI.AdaptationHidden property with a navigation path weren't applied to the filter request even though they were added in the UI.SelectionFields annotation.
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the avatar is displayed without cropping its sides
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now consider the value null for filter conditions if the In-Parameter is annotated with InitialValueIsSignificant
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display the 'Others' group in value help fields which are dropdown
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the text area label is hidden if it is the only field in a section or subsection
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue when adding and removing custom columns containing building blocks from the table personalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with handling the navigation path when evaluating the filter conditions in the value list
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue with the processing of the ODataListBinding in the Define Conditions tab
    • Type: FIX, Description: When using browser autofill, we no longer read from the undefined control of the related value help
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that MDC table properties can no longer be changed in adaption projects
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure filter fields from the manifest are not added to a custom filter bar pointing to a different entity set
    • Type: FIX, Description: The 'Go' button in the filter bar of a custom table now triggers a data request every time it is selected
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly update the headerLevel property value when a section or subsection title is merged with the control title
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We no longer display the semantic link if the quick view isn't defined and an app isn't assigned to the user's role
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support displaying fields with a fixed value list as radio buttons
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: End users can now delete the empty rows of a table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the correct order of fields in the Create popup
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure the avatar is displayed without cropping its sides
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the focus on an object page is set to the first mandatory field on small screen devices
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the text area label is hidden if it is the only field in a section or subsection
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue with exporting columns added using page variant management in a list report with multiple views
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly update the headerLevel property value when a section or subsection title is merged with the control title
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the title does not overlap with global actions on the object page
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We've now enabled the visualization of normal shapes together with the stock charts in a Gantt row
  • Library: sap.m

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: The quick view content can now be displayed by clicking the ObjectIdentifier link in the list report and analytical list page
